alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Delaware County through 445 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sidney Center, or 7 miles northwest of Walton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin and Loomis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm .
